featured.text: After watching a TV program on natural history, Adam decided to go on a ______ for dinosaur fossils in South Dakota.

The slow and clumsy wetas have been around on the island since the times of the dinosaurs, and have evolved and survived in an environment where they had no enemies until rats came to the island with European immigrants.
A hundred million years ago, in the age of dinosaurs, redwoods were common in the forests of a much more moist and tropical North America.

definition.zh_def: 恐龍：一種在約2.3億年前至6600萬年前生活的爬行動物，通常具有大型身體和特徵性的骨骼結構。
definition.en_def: Dinosaur: A type of reptile that lived approximately 230 million to 66 million years ago, typically characterized by large body size and distinctive skeletal structures.
definition.example: The dinosaur roamed the Earth millions of years ago.
